channel.title: Comments for page "Shadow Warrior"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Shadow Warrior"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: now this item is called Shadow Warrior

item.title: Seems totally random.
item.content:encoded: Like so much of this game, the appearance of your shadow seems as random as item drops or mission rolls. It took me three days to get my "Hollow Jaw" drops for All You Can Eat 2, and they all dropped on day 3. Sometimes this game just screws with you.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: How does one increase the chance of fighting his shadow??

item.title: Dark Hour
item.content:encoded: Yes, i have only ran into my shadow outside of the dark hour

item.title: Dark Hour?
item.content:encoded:
So I've been playing for three seasons thus far, and on my very first fight in the Dark Hour with the Band, up popsâ€¦ my Shadow. I never encountered it before this point.
A friend brings up a point and I don't know whether it is the case, or not; has anyone encountered the Shadow outside of the Dark Hour with the Band?
